entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning near noon then changing to periods of snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
